title: Gila-Gila Remaja 2
description:
Release Date: 21 Mar 2013

Language:Malay

Genre:Action / Comedy

Running Time: 100 minutes

Director:Naga

Cast:Hairul Azreen,Faralyna Idris, Fizz Fairuz, Taiyuddin Bakar

A movie depicting the lifestyle of the younger generation with a love triangle thrown in the mix. Afiq (Hairul Azreen) is a rich kid who fancies motorbike racing and dancing while Lisa (Faralyna Idris) is a shy, reserved young girl that comes from a modest upbringing. Catch the romance, action and comedy this movie offers and you will surely be entertained.
